name: Slime Escape (itch) (PenguinZ3D)
description:
This is Slime Escape!

In this game, you are a little slime who is trapped and must collect a key in order to escape.

This is my very first game so don't expect much.

FYI: This game is Windows Only for now I will add a Mac port soon

CONTROLS:

A: For Left

D: For Right

Spacebar: For Jump

ESC: For Pause Menu
